A 4 Marla plot offers enough space to construct a modest yet comfortable single-floor house with sufficient setback area. These plots are highly sought after due to their lower initial investment cost and faster resale potential in the Jagadhri Gate area. faqs.question: How does the plot size classification Marla compare to Square Yards
faqs.answer: In Ambala and neighboring regions, land is often measured in Marla. One Marla typically equates to approximately 25 to 30 square yards depending on local measurements and specific urban planning standards in the region. For example, a 6 Marla Plot For Sale in Jagadhri Gate would generally measure between 150 to 180 square yards. We provide exact, certified dimensions in square feet and square yards for every plot listing to ensure full accuracy.
